DellDriveSMARTAttributes.description: An instance of DellDriveSMARTAttributes will have SAS/SATA SSDs SMARTAttributes specific data.
DellDriveSMARTAttributes.longDescription: An instance of DellDriveSMARTAttributes will have SAS/SATA SSDs SMAAttributes specific data.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CRCErrorCountPercent.description: This property shall represent the CRC error count.
CRCErrorCountPercent.longDescription: This property shall represent the CRC error count.

CommandTimeoutCount.description: This property shall represent number of aborted operations due to disk timeout.
CommandTimeoutCount.longDescription: This property shall represent number of aborted operations due to disk timeout.

CurrentPendingSectorCount.description: This property shall represent current pending sector count
CurrentPendingSectorCount.longDescription: This property shall represent current pending sector count

DriveLifeRemainingPercent.description: This property shall represent the percentage life remaining for the drive.
DriveLifeRemainingPercent.longDescription: This property shall represent the percentage life remaining for the drive.

DriveTemperatureCelsius.description: This property shall represent the Drive temperature in Celsius.
DriveTemperatureCelsius.longDescription: This property shall represent the Drive temperature in Celsius.

ECCERate.description: This property shall represent the uncorrected read errors reported
ECCERate.longDescription: This property shall represent the uncorrected read errors reported

EraseFailCount.description: This property shall represent the Erase fail count.
EraseFailCount.longDescription: This property shall represent the Erase fail count.

ExceptionModeStatus.description: This property shall represent the Exception mode status
ExceptionModeStatus.longDescription: This property shall represent the Exception mode status.

MediaWriteCount.description: This propert shall represent the Media (SSD) write count
MediaWriteCount.longDescription: This property shall represent the Media (SSD) write count.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PowerCycleCount.description: This property shall represent the count of full hard disk power on/off cycles.
PowerCycleCount.longDescription: This property shall represent the count of full hard disk power on/off cycles..

PowerOnHours.description: This property shall represent the total count of hours (or minutes, or seconds, depending on manufacturer) in power-on state
PowerOnHours.longDescription: This property shall represent the total count of hours (or minutes, or seconds, depending on manufacturer) in power-on state

ProgramFailCount.description: This property shall represent the program fail count since drive was deployed
ProgramFailCount.longDescription: This property shall represent the program fail count since drive was deployed.

ReadErrorRate.description: This property shall represent the Read error rate.
ReadErrorRate.longDescription: This property shall represent the Read error rate.

ReallocatedBlockCount.description: This propert shall represent the Reallocated block count
ReallocatedBlockCount.longDescription: This property shall represent the Reallocated block count

UncorrectableErrorCount.description: This property shall represent the uncorrectable error count.
UncorrectableErrorCount.longDescription: This property shall represent the uncorrectable error count

UncorrectableLBACount.description: This property shall represent uncorrectable LBA(Logical block addressing) count
UncorrectableLBACount.longDescription: This property shall represent uncorrectable LBA(Logical block addressing) count

UnusedReservedBlockCount.description: This property shall represent the unused reserved block count
UnusedReservedBlockCount.longDescription: This property shall represent the unused reserved block count

UsedReservedBlockCount.description: This property shall represent the used reserved block count.
UsedReservedBlockCount.longDescription: This property shall represent the used reserved block count

VolatileMemoryBackupSourceFailures.description: This property shall represent the volatile memory backup source failures
VolatileMemoryBackupSourceFailures.longDescription: This property shall represent the volatile memory backup source failures

title: #DellDriveSMARTAttributes.v1_0_0.DellDriveSMARTAttributes
